spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacencies are correct. Minor inaccuracies in door hinge orientation (Bedroom 1 door opens outward instead of inward). Window placement is mostly faithful, though the window in the stairwell is missing a pane divider.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to cutaway view and background constraints. Deduction taken for the 'UP' staircase landing being rendered as a hole/void rather than a solid continuation of the floor structure as indicated in the blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate, specifically in the kitchen and dining areas. The sofa arrangement in the living room is slightly simplified compared to the specific U-shape indicated in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, soft ambient lighting, and an orthographic isometric camera angle are all present.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom 1 door leaf orientation is reversed compared to the floor plan.
The stairwell floor contains a black void/hole not present in the architectural intent.
Missing specific detail in living room furniture (individual armchairs replaced by a simpler modular block).
